name: START COAST
description_context: Welcome there is the start of my adventure, dive into coding during pandemic (COVID-19), and engage with a supportive community. Their dream of joining Paladium’s team takes shape through learning and personal projects.

content.title: Discovering Paladium and Aspirations
content.description: Back in 2015, I stumbled upon Paladium, a French Minecraft PVP server, while watching videos. Fuze III, the mastermind behind Paladium, became my inspiration, and I dreamed of joining his team someday.

content.title: Lockdown and My Dive into Coding
content.description: During the 2020 lockdown, I was in 8th grade, and I received my first computer. That’s when I delved into the world of programming, starting with C and then exploring JavaScript using NodeJS to create Discord bots.

content.title: Learning and Personal Projects
content.description: Over the years, I engaged with talented developers and former Paladium employees. I honed my skills in technologies like NuxtJS, Vue, Tailwind, and Electron. Simultaneously, I worked on personal projects, including my portfolio (built with NextJS and MongoDB) and Netanime (using React, MongoDB, and NodeJS).

content.title: Community Engagement and Moderation
content.description: I actively participate in the 'Paladium Dev' Discord server, where I caught the attention of the friendly developer community. Eventually, I earned the role of moderator... Next part toward Modded Marsh.

name: WASTING WOODS
description_context: Embark on my Minecraft odyssey. Texture packs, servers, and a love for 1.16 and 1.18 define my blocky adventure.

content.title: Beginnings in Pocket Edition (2013)
content.description: In the quaint realm of Minecraft, my journey began back in 2013. Armed with my trusty mobile device, I delved into the pixelated world of Pocket Edition. The blocky landscapes unfolded before me, and I was hooked.

content.title: Texture Packs and Creative Ventures
content.description: As the sun set and rose countless times, I discovered the magic of texture packs. Armed with my creativity, I crafted custom textures that transformed mundane blocks into works of art. My virtual toolbox overflowed with vibrant hues and intricate patterns.

content.title: Building My Own Minecraft Universe (Server)
content.description: But why stop at textures? I yearned to shape entire worlds. So, I donned my builder’s hat and set forth to create servers. These digital realms buzzed with life as players explored, battled, and built together. My heart swelled with pride as my creations flourished.

content.title: Redstone & Commands Blocks: My True Passion
content.description: Yet, amidst the towering castles and sprawling cities, one thing captivated me above all: redstone. The intricate circuits, hidden doors, and automated farms fueled my fascination. I tinkered, experimented, and occasionally blew things up (oops!). Redstone became my muse, my playground of logic and creativity.

content.title: Versions Close to My Heart: 1.15, 1.16 and 1.18
content.description: Ah, the sweet nostalgia of version updates! While each brought new wonders, two hold a special place in my heart—the enchanting Nether Update (1.16) and the awe-inspiring Caves & Cliffs Update (1.18). The crimson forests, ancient debris, and elusive axolotls—they’re etched into my Minecraft memories. Don't forget the bees update (1.15) !

name: MODDED MARSH
description_context: Positioned on Modded in the development of features and bug resolution of the entire site (April 2023 - March 2024).

content.title: Different tasks that I carried out for Modded
content.description:
- Crafting and maintaining the client site with NuxtJS (front-end and back-end).
- Designing, developing, and maintaining the administrative panel with NuxtJS (front-end and back-end).
- Successfully deployed to Cloudflare using Pages and Workers.
- Leveraging the Trello application for smooth project management.
- Employing version control with GitLab and setting up CI/CD for efficient workflow.
- Creating and managing functionality with the Stripe API for seamless payments and subscriptions.
- Implementing various API integrations for enhanced performance (such as remote server launch).
- Utilizing Cloudflare's KV integration for efficient storage of key-value information.
- Building and maintaining SSO for secure user connections.
- Skillfully integrating, developing, and maintaining a mailing API.
- Ensuring the development and upkeep of front-end functionality of the launcher's menu.
